title: My Wife, the Movie Star
text: My Wife, the Movie Star (German: Meine Frau, die Filmschauspielerin) is a 1919 German <a href="silent%20film">silent</a> <a href="comedy%20film">comedy film</a> directed by <a href="Ernst%20Lubitsch">Ernst Lubitsch</a> and starring <a href="Ossi%20Oswalda">Ossi Oswalda</a>, <a href="Paul%20Biensfeldt">Paul Biensfeldt</a> and <a href="Victor%20Janson">Victor Janson</a>.
